sentences.en: Based on the HOLM theory, the wear quantity calculating formulae of mechanical seal wear are derived.
sentences.cn: 依据HOLM理论, 推导出了机械密封磨损量的计算公式.

sentences.en: Ian Holm was always Peter Jackson's first choice to play Bilbo Baggins.
sentences.cn: 伊恩·荷姆一直是杰克逊首选的扮演比尔伯·巴金斯的人选.

sentences.en: The world premiere of Harold Pinter's new play casts Ian Holm in the lead role.
sentences.cn: 哈罗德·品特新剧的世界首演由伊恩·霍尔姆担纲主演。

trans.tran_cn: <主英>河边肥沃的低地，河（或湖）中小岛，沿河平地
trans.tran_en: an island in a river, lake, or estuary
